tool_description: Discovers and maps all customer data across different systems and databases within the organization.

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer account

email_address.description: Customer email address for additional lookup

search_scope.description: List of systems to search in

error_messages: Invalid customer ID format: Customer ID must be alphanumeric string between 5-50 characters.
Customer not found: No data found for the provided customer identifier.
System access denied: Insufficient permissions to access one or more specified systems.
Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address if using email lookup.
usage: Provide customer_id as primary identifier, optionally add email_address for verification and specify search_scope to limit system search. Returns comprehensive mapping of customer data locations.

data_locations.description: List of system/database locations containing customer data

record_count.description: Total number of records found across all systems
